lead_paragraph: The IndyCar driver Mike Conway will miss at least three months with back and leg injuries from his frightening crash on the next-to-last lap of the Indianapolis 500.
snippet: The IndyCar driver Mike Conway will miss at least three months with back and leg injuries from his frightening crash on the next-to-last lap of the Indianapolis 500.

headline.main: Conway Out at Least 3 Months From Injuries at Indianapolis 500
headline.print_headline: Conway Out at Least 3 Months From Injuries at Indianapolis 500
